data.title: California Nonprofits of the Year
data.text:
A total of 774 nonprofit organizations have been honored as a California Nonprofit of the Year in their district since the program was established in 2015. We are grateful to the legislators who participate each year, and to the work of every nonprofit organization noted here.

Go directly to a specific year: 2023 | 2022 | 2021 | 2020 | 2019 | 2018 | 2017 | 2016
